response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for you, worth $1,500,000 by your estimation. I am offering this unique item to you at a carefully considered price of $1,200,000. This offer represents a strategic midpoint between its intrinsic value and my asking price, aiming to ensure a mutually beneficial transaction. Please consider this proposal thoughtfully, and let me know if you require any further information or clarification about the product. I am confident that this acquisition will be a significant milestone for you, adding substantial value to your collection or endeavors. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1200000}
